title: The 49ers Gain a Home-Field Advantage
description:
The NFL season is just around the corner and like all of us, the San Francisco 49ers have been working remotely and finding ways to prepare both on and off the field. Hear from ace defensive lineman Arik Armstead about how he and teammates are working together while training apart. 

It’s about more than just players staying in shape though. The back office has had to go completely remote as well. Hannah Gordon, Chief Administrative Officer and General Counsel shares how this experience has been unlike anything she’s ever experienced in her 20 years of working in football.

Citrix has created a virtual series on remote work filled with research, tools, and best practices to guide, support, and enable the remote workforce. 

The San Francisco 49ers leverage digital workspace solutions to drive superior performance on and off the field. Learn more about how they up their game with Citrix. 

Learn more about leadership expert Adrian Gostick.
author: podcast@citrix.com (Citrix)
